mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nutrient( id, food_cd, group_name, food_name, research_year, maker_name, ref_name, serving_size, calorie, carbohydrate, protein, province, sugars, salt, cholesterol, saturated_fatty_acids, trans_fat) VALUES( #{id}, #{foodCd}, #{groupName}, #{foodName}, #{researchYear}, #{makerName}, #{refName}, #{servingSize}, #{calorie}, #{carbohydrate}, #{protein}, #{province}, #{sugars}, #{salt}, #{cholesterol}, #{saturatedFattyAcids}, #{transFat})
